mcq.statement: Choose the future tense sentence from the following: Tahir and Asad will go to Lahore, Tahir and Asad went to Lahore, Tahir and Asad have gone to Lahore, Tahir and Asad go to Lahore

options.a: Tahir and Asad will go to Lahore
options.b: Tahir and Asad went to Lahore
options.c: Tahir and Asad have gone to Lahore
options.d: Tahir and Asad go to Lahore
